name: The Lawlor Group, Inc.
tagline: Business Consultant in Eden Prairie, Minnesota
description: The Lawlor Group is one of the nation's preeminent higher education research and marketing firms that has served over 250 colleges and universities since 1987. The firm, which consistently provides customized counsel and service, is dedicated to the art and science of marketing. The result is that our clients gain market intelligence that leads to intelligent solutions.
